Overview

Typically the licenses listed for the project are that of the project itself, and not of dependencies.

Project License

This project is provided under multiple licenses:

  • BSD 2-Clauses License
  • FreeBSD Documentation License

BSD 2-Clauses License

The Simplified BSD license is for the code (core, test, examples).

FreeBSD Documentation License

This license is for the documentation, that is in the /doc directory and in the Wiki.
